title: What are our responsibilities?
intro_list: Among the main responsibilities of Customer Service, the following stand out:
img_alt: Call center team working in modern environment

c1.title: Multichannel Service
c1.text: Offer excellent service through different channels: phone, email, chat and electronic means.

c2.title: Inbound Service
c2.text: Provide information, handle complaints, suggestions and compliments, deal with objections and offer first-level solutions whenever possible.

c3.title: Outbound Service
c3.text: Make active contacts with customers, especially in promotional campaigns and marketing actions related to the Group's Cards. This includes card activation, registration updates, promotion communication and cancellation reversal.

c4.title: Organization and Tabulation
c4.text: Organize and tabulate data, prepare reports and support the demands of the support team and Coordination.

proatividade: Customer Service professionals also act proactively, identifying improvements in scripts and service standards, based on day-to-day observation and opportunity analysis. These contributions are essential for the constant evolution of the service provided and for maintaining excellence in customer relationships.
active_text: Perform outbound calls, especially in promotional campaigns and actions related to the Group's Cards:

t1.title: 1. Card activation
t1.text: Contact customers to activate newly issued cards.

t2.title: 2. Registration update
t2.text: Keep customer data always up to date.

t3.title: 3. Promotion communication
t3.text: Inform about exclusive offers and benefits.

t4.title: 4. Cancellation reversal
t4.text: Work to retain customers who want to cancel services.

quiz.question: You notice that several customers are calling with the same question about a new promotion. What's the best attitude aligned with the continuous improvement responsibilities of CS?
quiz.opt_a: A) Continue answering each one individually without reporting the fact.
quiz.opt_b: B) Complain to colleagues that customers don't know how to read the rules.
quiz.opt_c: C) Report the observed pattern to the supervisor so that promotion communication can be adjusted.
quiz.opt_d: D) Tell the customer to look for the information on the website.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! Proactivity in identifying patterns helps improve the process for everyone.
